channel.title: Installation on Graphite
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on Graphite

item.title: Windows
item.description: Windows To install Graphite on Windows, follow these steps: Go to the Releases page. Download the latest release. Run the installer and follow the on-screen instructions to install Graphite. Once installed, you can launch Graphite and start analyzing your data.

item.title: Linux
item.description: Linux To install Graphite on Linux, follow these steps: Open a terminal. Run the following commands to download and install Graphite: wget https://github.com/Meliani-Mehdi/Graphite_QT/releases/download/v1.0.0/Graphite-Linux.tar.gz tar -zxvf Graphite-Linux.tar.gz cd Graphite-Linux ./install.sh Once installed, you can launch Graphite from the applications menu or by running Graphite in the terminal.

item.title: mac
item.description: macOS To install Graphite on macOS, follow these steps: Go to the Releases page. Download the latest release. Open the downloaded DMG file and drag the Graphite application to your Applications folder. Once installed, you can launch Graphite from the Applications folder. For more detailed installation instructions and troubleshooting tips, refer to the Installation Guide.
